title: Game Dev Tycoon 1.5.11 Linux(DEB) October
description:
NOTE: I am uploading .DEB and .RPM SEPERATELY THIS TIME (And skipping Tar.GZ unless requested.)  

Now then.. on with game description

"Welcome to Game Dev Tycoon, this game was created by Greenheart Games, which was founded with an agenda to make 'fun to play instead of mind numbing money grabbers. Less social, less ville, more game is our motto" 
^ taken from the Gamedevtycoon wikia(back in 2013).



Installation directions:

"On Linux we provide different downloads (.deb, .rpm, .tar.gz) to make installations on different Linux distributions easier. Since you're ÃŽâ€œÃƒâ€¡Ãƒâ€“re a Linux user you will likely know what to do"

^ From their support site...  I'm uploading the .RPM and .DEB here (this is DEB)



1. Download and extract the file 
2. Read note,(Might have to .zip the file/folder)
3. install (I assume) 
4. Enjoy!
5. If you like the game, Buy it!

Up to you to decide which version to actually use!(Note I don't use Linux and therefore do not know with any certainty which you might need to use! .. But I am willing to help, just comment)

Description:

Start your own game development company and replay the history of gaming in this business simulation game. Start your business in a garage in the 80s. Research new technologies and create best selling games. Hire and train staff. Move into bigger offices and unlock secret labs. Become the leader of the market and gain worldwide fans.


Features:

- Start your own game Development company in the 80's
- Design and create your own games
- Research new technologies
- Create your own custom game engine
- Move into bigger offices
- Forge a world-class development team
- Unlock secret labs
- Conduct industry changing products
- Unlock achievements!
- NOW WITH THE ABILITY TO USE MODS IN GAME! (STILL Haven't tried it myself though)

Once more, enjoy the gameplay, I'll update as updates happen..    and Should you like the game, GO BUY IT! (I certainly did)  its only like $9 bucks.

This is the .RPM  version,     enjoy!

Here is the updated DEB Version (Also doing RPM.   Can do Tar.GZ on request.)

Also, everything in the description is basically copy paste from old edition,   likely quite a few more features but I am tired and lazy and ..   if you are wanting this game you likely already know the features!


Like it? Buy it.

Might have to change the file type to .zip (Thanks Coleix from last upload)   Again, no idea as I currently lack Linux experience
